decision_conditions: Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of planning permission 19/02482/FUL is amended as follows:18024(Pa)09918024(Pa)10018024(Pa)10118024(Pa)10218024(Pa)10318024(Pa)20018024(Pa)201Are replaced by:PA101 W102-01 - P3W103-01-P2PA104 - P1PA105 PA200-P1PA201-P1PA202 - P1PA300 - P1Reason:  For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
The Council consider the amendments to be non-material and as such, it is recommended that a S96A application for a non-material amendment is approved.

Prior to the commencement of the above ground works (other than demolition) associated with the erection of the building/s fronting onto Ewell Road, architectural details to be shown on plans at 1:10 of the following:Window / door detailingWindow revealsDoor recessesArchitectural detailing around the openings (doors and windows)Rainwater goodsFascia / Soffit/ Barge BoardsChimney detailsshall have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall not be constructed other than in accordance with the approved details.Reason: In the interest of preserving the character and appearance of the area in accordance with Policy DM10 RBK Core Strategy
description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 19/02482/FUL (Change of use of motorcycle show sales units 318, 320 and 312(Class Sui Generis) to Retail (Class A1). Demolition of the existing ground and first floor rear extensions, ancillary buildings and the 1.5 storey workshop to the side and rear of unit 318 and 320 Ewell Road. Erection of a single, two and three storey extension to the eastern side and rear of the existing building unit 318 and 320 and further internal alterations. Erection of two semi-detached properties to the rear of the site to accommodate 2x retail and 9 residential units with provision of 6 parking spaces and 16 cycle stores) dated 20/06/2020. For amendments please refer to Application form
